comments.body: Escrow accepted?What about the price and minimum of order?

comments.author: Lucaas
comments.body: Quote from: paid2 on December 24, 2023, 10:58:20 AMEscrow accepted?What about the price and minimum of order?Sure, I can accept reliable escrow.Minimum order is 10 cards at price 5,00 EUR per card (on every card there is 2.65 EUR balance) + shipping cost.We can arrange smaller order with higher price per card.

comments.author: cuentas2024
comments.body: Quote from: Lucaas on December 24, 2023, 09:42:41 PMQuote from: paid2 on December 24, 2023, 10:58:20 AMEscrow accepted?What about the price and minimum of order?Sure, I can accept reliable escrow.Minimum order is 10 cards at price 5,00 EUR per card (on every card there is 2.65 EUR balance) + shipping cost.We can arrange smaller order with higher price per card. What would be the shipping cost?
